itemInfo.itemDesc:
Baked grain dough with fruits in it. 
- Unique effect: MP +70 for 90 min.
 Casting Speed Rank +1 for 90 min.
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30 min.

item.name: Sugar
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Wheat Dough
item.desc:
A product made by Shaking Wheat Flour obtained through Grinding together with Mineral Water purchased at a Shop.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Shaking.

- Usage: Exotic Herbal Wine, Soft Bread, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Apple
item.desc: A tasty apple used as an ingredient in Cooking.\nUsage: Fruit Juice, Fruit Pudding, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered from Apple Trees using Bare Hands or purchased from a special Merchant.

item.name: Cream
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be created by Shaking sugar with the milk obtained from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fruit Pie, Fish Soup, etc.

item.name: Sugar
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.
